channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Opinion: The Election Is Now About Choosing America’s First King
item.description: SCOTUS has made the upcoming 2024 presidential election about choosing the United States first essential King. A president with King-like powers, basically. A democracy in name, only.

item.title: Mayorkas Lies to the American People During Arizona Visit
item.description: Recently impeached Department of Homeland Security Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas visited Tucson, Arizona, and attempted to sell President Biden’s recent executive action as having worked to reduce the number of illegal crossings at the southern border. To read the rest of the article click here The post Mayorkas Lies to the American People During Arizona Visit appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Nancy Pelosi: The Supreme Court placed itself on trial with its immunity decision
item.description: Speaker Emerita Nancy Pelosi said the Supreme Court's decision in Trump v. United States placed the court itself on trial.

item.title: Sanctuary Politicians Need to Stop Lying and Admit the Obvious
item.description: Sanctuary politicians are getting nervous, and understandably so. The public is outraged over the surge of high-profile crimes allegedly committed by illegal aliens including the recent murder of 12-year old Jocelyn Nungaray in Houston, the sexual assault of a 13-year-old girl in New York City, and the Maryland rape and murder of Rachel Morin, mother [...] The post Sanctuary Politicians Need to Stop Lying and Admit the Obvious appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez To File Articles Of Impeachment Against SCOTUS Justices
item.description: Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez announced that she will be filing articles of impeachment against corrupt Supreme Court justices when the House returns.

item.title: White House Leaves Out Key Fact in Statements on Alleged Murders of Americans by Illegal Aliens
item.description: Over the past two weeks, Americans have seen numerous stories about horrific crimes allegedly committed by illegal aliens. The White House commented on two cases but failed to mention a key fact. To read the rest of the article click here The post White House Leaves Out Key Fact in Statements on Alleged Murders of Americans by Illegal Aliens appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Chief Justice Roberts ‘Decrees the end of DOJ independence in an offhanded sentence’
item.description: The Republican majority on the Supreme Court really seem to despise the principles upon which the United States was founded. Today, for example, Chief Justice Roberts appears to enshrine the end of the independence of the Department of Justice.

item.title: How to Drive Down the Cost of Medical Care for Illegals? Just Ask
item.description: The ballooning costs of medical care for illegal aliens is a huge burden on states and cities across the U.S. FAIR’s 2023 cost study found that at least $21 billion in taxpayer funds are spent by states and local governments on healthcare for illegal aliens every year, and that number is only increasing as the [...] The post How to Drive Down the Cost of Medical Care for Illegals? Just Ask appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: The Conservative SCOTUS Majority Puts Presidents Above The Law
item.description: While the Supreme Court didn't give Trump absolute immunity, it said presidents can abuse their power and pressure federal government agencies to overturn elections. That is considered an "official act."

item.title: The Great Paradox: How Unchecked Mass Migration Hurts Migrants
item.description: Pro-mass-migration voices depict mass migration as an unqualified good for everyone involved, minimizing or refusing to even acknowledge negative side effects or costs. To read the rest of the article click here The post The Great Paradox: How Unchecked Mass Migration Hurts Migrants appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .
